name: Gravitableau
description:
Welcome to Gravitableau! This game was made for the Paint Jam 2020 game jam in just 48 hours.

Gravitableau is a puzzle platformer where the background color influences the gravity of your player.

Controls:

  • A / D - Walk Left / Right
  • Space - Jump
  • SHIFT + A/D/S - "Phase" through thin walls in the direction you're holding

Tip: You must be standing on the ground to phase through the wall or the floor!

Music by user Dogers on opengameart.org
